description:
cmd/dist, cmd/ld: GO_EXTLINK_ENABLED=0 defaults to -linkmode=internal

Change build system to set GO_EXTLINK_ENABLED=0 by default for
OS X 10.6, since the system linker has a bug and can not
handle the object files generated by 6l.

Fixes issue 5130.

messages.text:
LGTM
never mind about 'go env' - this applies at installation only and isn't relevant in the way the other $GO variables are.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

please print it in src/cmd/go/env.go and document it there too

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/make.bash
File src/make.bash (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/make.bash#newcode35
src/make.bash:35: # controls the default behaviour of the linker's -linkmode option.  If
behavioUr? wow.

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/make.bash#newcode36
src/make.bash:36: # not set the default is based on the system.
hard to parse - needs a comma and a reference. how about just
The default value depends on the system.

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/run.bash
File src/run.bash (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/run.bash#newcode93
src/run.bash:93: case `uname -r` in
$(uname -r) is local style

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/make.bash
File src/make.bash (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/make.bash#newcode35
src/make.bash:35: # controls the default behaviour of the linker's -linkmode option.  If
On 2013/03/29 23:12:37, r wrote:
> behavioUr? wow.

Extraneous vowels are cool.  But I removed this one.

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/make.bash#newcode36
src/make.bash:36: # not set the default is based on the system.
On 2013/03/29 23:12:37, r wrote:
> hard to parse - needs a comma and a reference. how about just
> The default value depends on the system.

Done.

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/run.bash
File src/run.bash (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8183043/diff/1/src/run.bash#newcode93
src/run.bash:93: case `uname -r` in
On 2013/03/29 23:12:37, r wrote:
> $(uname -r) is local style

Done.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f248b961193a ***

Change build system to set GO_EXTLINK_ENABLED=0 by default for
OS X 10.6, since the system linker has a bug and can not
handle the object files generated by 6l.

Fixes issue 5130.

CC=golang-dev
